title: Baltimore National Heritage Area: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       The heritage area covers roughly 22 square miles. The core of the heritage area includes the historic neighborhoods around Baltimore's Inner Harbor. The heritage area extends west to include the Gwynns Falls and Leakin Park, and reaches north to include Druid Hill Park and the Cylburn Arboretum. The heritage area is not contiguous: Mount Auburn Cemetery is also included with the heritage area boundary. For more information, visit: http://explorebaltimore.org/
